spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout deviations. (E5/E2) 3D render shows an additional small bedroom/room at the far-right side that is not present in the 2D plan (plan appears to have 3 bedrooms; render reads as 4 sleeping rooms). (E2) The right-side service core (baths/closets) is rearranged: bathroom locations and corridor segmentation do not match the 2D plan’s clustered bath areas. (E3/E2) Door locations and swing/orientation differ from plan (notably around the central living/dining transitions and bedroom entries). (E2) Balcony/terrace configuration differs: render includes prominent terraces with railings whose size/placement does not cleanly match the smaller exterior projections in the plan. (E4) Proportions are off: central living/dining footprint vs. bedroom block widths and the right wing depth are distorted compared to the 2D outline.

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural relationships are not faithfully preserved. (E2) Adjacency errors: the plan’s room-to-room connections (especially the right bedroom/bath adjacency and corridor layout) do not match the render’s corridor and closet placements. (E5) Hallucinated extra room used as a bedroom on the far-right. (E1) At least one planned small ancillary space/exterior projection is not represented as drawn (plan indicates smaller protrusions; render consolidates/reshapes them). (E3) Door embedding/orientation inconsistent with plan where several openings appear moved or resized. Wall thickness looks generally consistent visually, but the wall graph (where walls exist) differs substantially from the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: (E2/E5) Furniture program does not align with plan: render assigns beds to spaces that do not exist in the plan (extra bedroom), and several rooms (living/dining) are furnished in a different arrangement than the 2D symbols suggest. (E4) Some furniture scale feels inconsistent relative to room sizes due to proportion distortion (e.g., dining table vs. circulation widths).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Visually strong render quality despite plan mismatch. Isometric camera is coherent and readable (minor perspective/scale cues make it more "render" than strict axonometric). Lighting is clean and geometry is mostly crisp with minimal artifacts. Composition is clear; however, large openings/railings and simplified glazing read as stylized rather than plan-accurate.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated additional room/bedroom at the far-right side (render shows more sleeping rooms than the 2D plan).
Right-side bathrooms/closets/corridor layout is rearranged; service-core placement and segmentation do not match the 2D plan.
Multiple door placements and swing/orientations differ from the 2D plan (notably around central living/dining and bedroom entries).
Balcony/terrace sizes and placements are inconsistent with the 2D plan’s smaller exterior projections.
Room proportions distorted: relative widths/depths of the living/dining zone vs. bedroom wings do not match the 2D plan.
Window/glazing placement simplified and does not align with the plan’s opening distribution along exterior walls.
At least one small planned ancillary/exterior projection (as drawn in 2D) is missing or merged into a different element in the 3D render.
